channel.title: Nationalism on knowledge base

item.title: The Dark Knight Rises the Climb Scene
item.description:
One more youtube video, batman this time. This scene might have given goose bumps to Roger Federer too, you may fall but it’s what you choose afterwards that matters the most.

Also the dialogue from rocky comes to my mind.

It ain’t about how hard you hit; It’s about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.

American nationalism had brought beautiful movies out there and something to learn from. Deserters/Refugees coming from every parts of world and joining together and making a great nation. Nation making is huge task, India still isn’t a nation yet despite such commonality, history and culture, but American built nation from deserters, some refugees true but most deserters.

Always in awe to see to see American might and what they have achieved. They really are a nation to look upto.
